```{r load-data}

# ieeg data #
ofc_hfa_data <- read_csv( path(here(), "munge", "hfa_ieeg_ofc_all_subs_iti_onset.csv"))

# behavioral data #
all_subs_g_dist <- read_csv(path(here(), "munge", "all_subs_distance_df.csv"))
all_subs_ng_dist <- read_csv(path(here(), "munge", "all_subs_noghost_distance_df.csv"))

# combine ghost and no ghost #
all_subs_dist <- all_subs_g_dist %>% 
  select(-GhostLocation, -distance_to_ghost, -min_distance, -cdf_distance)
all_subs_dist <- rbind(all_subs_dist, all_subs_ng_dist)

# add ITI to behavioral df
behavior_iti_df <- all_subs_dist %>% 
  select(subject, trial_numeric, trial_time) %>%
  filter(trial_time < 1) %>%
  mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time - 1, 2))

all_subs_dist <- full_join(all_subs_dist, behavior_iti_df)

```



```{r elec-response, fig.width=20, fig.height=40}

## plot electrode level ERPS ##

avg_ofc_hfa_data <- ofc_hfa_data %>%
  rename(hfa = theta) %>%
  group_by(trial_time, electrode, subject) %>%
  mutate(mean_elec_hfa = mean(hfa)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(-trial_numeric, -hfa) %>%
  distinct() 

avg_ofc_hfa_data %>%
  mutate(elec_id = paste0(subject, "_", gsub("_.*", "", electrode))) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_time, y = mean_elec_hfa, color = subject)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~elec_id, ncol = 6) +
  ylim(-.5, .5)

```


```{r subject-overall-response, fig.width= 12, fig.height=12}

## plot subject and combined ERPS ##

avg_ofc_hfa_data %>%
  group_by(trial_time, subject) %>%
  mutate(mean_hfa = mean(mean_elec_hfa)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_time, y = mean_hfa, color = subject)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  facet_wrap(~subject)

avg_ofc_hfa_data %>%
  group_by(trial_time, subject) %>%
  mutate(mean_sub_hfa = mean(mean_elec_hfa)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(-mean_elec_hfa, -electrode) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  group_by(trial_time) %>%
  mutate(mean_hfa = mean(mean_sub_hfa)) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_time, y = mean_hfa)) +
  geom_point(color = "black") +
  geom_line(color = "black") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) 


```



```{r merge-with-behavior, fig.width= 12, fig.height=12}

# merge behavior data with ieeg data
ofc_hfa_behave_df <- left_join(all_subs_dist %>% select(-move_step) %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)), 
                               ofc_hfa_data %>% rename(hfa = theta) %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)))

# validate we get the same ieeg data by comparing with above plots
avg_ofc_hfa_behave_df <- ofc_hfa_behave_df %>%
  group_by(trial_time, electrode, subject) %>%
  mutate(mean_elec_hfa = mean(hfa, na.rm = T)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(-trial_numeric, -hfa) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  group_by(trial_time, subject) %>%
  mutate(mean_sub_hfa = mean(mean_elec_hfa, na.rm = T)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  select(-mean_elec_hfa, -electrode) %>%
  distinct() %>%
  group_by(trial_time) %>%
  mutate(mean_hfa = mean(mean_sub_hfa, na.rm = T))


avg_ofc_hfa_behave_df %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = trial_time, y = mean_hfa)) +
  geom_point(color = "black") +
  geom_line(color = "black") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white")) +
  xlim(-1, 5) + ylim(-.15, .25)


```

## Whole Trial

```{r points-only-model}

ofc_hfa_data <- ofc_hfa_data %>% rename(hfa = hfa)

# merge behavior data with ieeg data
ofc_hfa_behave_df <- left_join(all_subs_dist %>% select(-move_step) %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)), 
                               ofc_hfa_data %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)))


# prep for linear mixed effects models #
ofc_hfa_lme_df <- ofc_hfa_behave_df %>%
  mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)) %>%
  filter(Direction != "Still") %>%
  filter(reward_groups != 99 & !is.na(electrode)) %>%
  mutate(elec_id = paste0(subject, "_", gsub("_.*", "", electrode))) %>%
  mutate(electrode = gsub("_.*", "", electrode)) %>%
  group_by(elec_id, trial_numeric, subject) %>%
  mutate(move_time = round(trial_time - first(trial_time), 2)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(move_time < 5) %>%
  select(subject, elec_id, hfa, trial_numeric, move_time, points_remaining)  %>%
  mutate(points_remaining = rescale(points_remaining)) 


points_r_results_only <- tibble(
  Estimate = numeric(0),
  `Std. Error` = numeric(0),
  df = numeric(0),
  `t value` = numeric(0),
  `Pr(>|t|)` = numeric(0)
)


for(step in sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time))){
  
  print(step)

  time_step_df <- ofc_hfa_lme_df %>%
    filter(move_time == step)
  
  model_1 <- summary(lmer(hfa ~ points_remaining + (1|subject/elec_id), data = time_step_df))
  
    # add to results
  points_r_results_only <- rbind(points_r_results_only, 
                           tibble(
                             Estimate = model_1$coefficients[2, "Estimate"],
                             `Std. Error` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"],
                             df = model_1$coefficients[2, "df"],
                             `t value` = model_1$coefficients[2, "t value"],
                             `Pr(>|t|)` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Pr(>|t|)"]
                           ))

}




```

```{r distance_to_ghost-model}
}
```

```{r combined-model}

# merge behavior data with ieeg data
ofc_hfa_behave_df <- left_join(all_subs_g_dist %>% select(-move_step) %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)), 
                               ofc_hfa_data %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)))


# prep for linear mixed effects models #
ofc_hfa_lme_df <- ofc_hfa_behave_df %>%
  mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)) %>%
  filter(Direction != "Still") %>%
  filter(reward_groups != 99 & !is.na(electrode)) %>%
  mutate(elec_id = paste0(subject, "_", gsub("_.*", "", electrode))) %>%
  mutate(electrode = gsub("_.*", "", electrode)) %>%
  group_by(elec_id, trial_numeric, subject) %>%
  mutate(move_time = round(trial_time - first(trial_time), 2)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(move_time < 5) %>%
  select(subject, elec_id, hfa, trial_numeric, move_time, points_remaining, distance_to_ghost)  %>%
  mutate(points_remaining = rescale(points_remaining)) %>%
  mutate(distance_to_ghost = rescale(distance_to_ghost))

dist_to_g_results <- tibble(
  Estimate = numeric(0),
  `Std. Error` = numeric(0),
  df = numeric(0),
  `t value` = numeric(0),
  `Pr(>|t|)` = numeric(0)
)

points_r_results <- tibble(
  Estimate = numeric(0),
  `Std. Error` = numeric(0),
  df = numeric(0),
  `t value` = numeric(0),
  `Pr(>|t|)` = numeric(0)
)

for(step in sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time))){
  
  print(step)

  time_step_df <- ofc_hfa_lme_df %>%
    filter(move_time == step)
  
  model_1 <- summary(lmer(hfa ~ distance_to_ghost + points_remaining + (1|subject/elec_id), data = time_step_df))
  
  # add to results
  dist_to_g_results <- rbind(dist_to_g_results, 
                           tibble(
                             Estimate = model_1$coefficients[2, "Estimate"],
                             `Std. Error` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"],
                             df = model_1$coefficients[2, "df"],
                             `t value` = model_1$coefficients[2, "t value"],
                             `Pr(>|t|)` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Pr(>|t|)"]
                           ))
  
  # add to results
  points_r_results <- rbind(points_r_results, 
                           tibble(
                             Estimate = model_1$coefficients[3, "Estimate"],
                             `Std. Error` = model_1$coefficients[3, "Std. Error"],
                             df = model_1$coefficients[3, "df"],
                             `t value` = model_1$coefficients[3, "t value"],
                             `Pr(>|t|)` = model_1$coefficients[3, "Pr(>|t|)"]
                           ))

  

}



```

```{r viz-models}

model_results_whole_trial <- rbind(dist_to_g_results_only %>% mutate(case = "dist_only") %>% mutate(move_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time))),
                       dist_to_g_results %>% mutate(case = "dist") %>% mutate(move_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time))),
                       points_r_results_only %>% mutate(case = "points_only") %>% mutate(move_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time))),
                       points_r_results %>% mutate(case = "points") %>% mutate(move_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time))))


model_results_whole_trial %>%
  mutate(sig = if_else(`Pr(>|t|)` < .05, "Sig", "Not Sig.")) %>%
  mutate(regressor = if_else(grepl("dist", case), "Distance to Ghost", "Points Remaining")) %>%
  mutate(model = if_else(grepl("only", case), "Individual", "Combined")) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = move_time, y = Estimate)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = sig, fill = regressor), size = 6, shape = 21) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype = model, color = regressor)) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), legend.position = "top") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#87C8B7", "white", "#FCC673", "black")) +
  xlim(0, 3.5) + ylim(-1, 1)


plot <- model_results_whole_trial %>%
  mutate(sig = if_else(`Pr(>|t|)` < .05, "Sig", "Not Sig.")) %>%
  mutate(regressor = if_else(grepl("dist", case), "Distance to Ghost", "Points Remaining")) %>%
  mutate(model = if_else(grepl("only", case), "Individual", "Combined")) %>%
  filter(model == "Combined") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = move_time, y = Estimate)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = sig, fill = regressor), size = 6, shape = 21) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype = model, color = regressor)) +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), legend.position = "top") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#87C8B7", "white", "#FCC673", "black")) +
  xlim(0, 3.5) + ylim(-1.5, 1.5) +
  ggtitle("OFC HFA, Trial Onset")

ggsave(path(here(), "figures", "linear_mixed_effect_models", "ofc_hfa_trial_onset.png"),
       plot = plot,
       width = 12,
       height = 8,
       units = "in",
       dpi = 300)


```



## Approach Only

```{r points-only-model}

# merge behavior data with ieeg data
ofc_hfa_behave_df <- left_join(all_subs_dist %>% select(-move_step) %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)), 
                               ofc_hfa_data %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)))


# prep for linear mixed effects models #
ofc_hfa_lme_df <- ofc_hfa_behave_df %>%
  mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)) %>%
  filter(Direction != "Still") %>%
  filter(reward_groups != 99 & !is.na(electrode)) %>%
  mutate(elec_id = paste0(subject, "_", gsub("_.*", "", electrode))) %>%
  mutate(electrode = gsub("_.*", "", electrode)) %>%
  group_by(elec_id, trial_numeric, subject) %>%
  mutate(event = if_else(last_away == away_choice & away_choice != 0, 1, 0)) %>%
  mutate(event = replace(event, is.na(event), 0)) %>%
  mutate(turnaround_time = if_else(event == 1, trial_time, 0)) %>%
  mutate(turn_time = round(trial_time - max(turnaround_time), 2)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(turn_time > -2 & turn_time < 2) %>%
  select(subject, elec_id, hfa, trial_numeric, turn_time, points_remaining)  %>%
  mutate(points_remaining = rescale(points_remaining)) 


points_r_results_only <- tibble(
  Estimate = numeric(0),
  `Std. Error` = numeric(0),
  df = numeric(0),
  `t value` = numeric(0),
  `Pr(>|t|)` = numeric(0)
)


for(step in sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$turn_time))){
  
  print(step)

  time_step_df <- ofc_hfa_lme_df %>%
    filter(turn_time == step)
  
  model_1 <- summary(lmer(hfa ~ points_remaining + (1|subject/elec_id), data = time_step_df))
  
    # add to results
  points_r_results_only <- rbind(points_r_results_only, 
                           tibble(
                             Estimate = model_1$coefficients[2, "Estimate"],
                             `Std. Error` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"],
                             df = model_1$coefficients[2, "df"],
                             `t value` = model_1$coefficients[2, "t value"],
                             `Pr(>|t|)` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Pr(>|t|)"]
                           ))

}




```

```{r viz-models}
model_results <- rbind(dist_to_g_results_only %>% mutate(case = "dist_only") %>% mutate(turn_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$turn_time))),
                       dist_to_g_results %>% mutate(case = "dist") %>% mutate(turn_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$turn_time))),
                       points_r_results_only %>% mutate(case = "points_only") %>% mutate(turn_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$turn_time))),
                       points_r_results %>% mutate(case = "points") %>% mutate(turn_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$turn_time))))


plot <- model_results %>%
  mutate(sig = if_else(`Pr(>|t|)` < .05, "Sig", "Not Sig.")) %>%
  mutate(regressor = if_else(grepl("dist", case), "Distance to Ghost", "Points Remaining")) %>%
  mutate(model = if_else(grepl("only", case), "Individual", "Combined")) %>%
  filter(model == "Combined") %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = turn_time, y = Estimate)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = sig, fill = regressor), size = 6, shape = 21) +
  geom_line(aes(linetype = model, color = regressor)) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "black") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), legend.position = "top") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#87C8B7", "white", "#FCC673", "black"))  +
  xlim(-2, 2) +
  ggtitle("OFC HFA, Turnaround")

ggsave(path(here(), "figures", "linear_mixed_effect_models", "ofc_hfa_trial_turnaround.png"),
       plot = plot,
       width = 12,
       height = 8,
       units = "in",
       dpi = 300)

```


## Combined value

```{r value-model}

# merge behavior data with ieeg data
ofc_hfa_behave_df <- left_join(all_subs_g_dist %>% select(-move_step) %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)), 
                               ofc_hfa_data %>% mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)))


# prep for linear mixed effects models #
ofc_hfa_lme_df <- ofc_hfa_behave_df %>%
  mutate(trial_time = round(trial_time, 2)) %>%
  filter(Direction != "Still") %>%
  filter(reward_groups != 99 & !is.na(electrode)) %>%
  mutate(elec_id = paste0(subject, "_", gsub("_.*", "", electrode))) %>%
  mutate(electrode = gsub("_.*", "", electrode)) %>%
  group_by(elec_id, trial_numeric, subject) %>%
  mutate(move_time = round(trial_time - first(trial_time), 2)) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  filter(move_time < 5) %>%
  select(subject, elec_id, hfa, trial_numeric, move_time, points_remaining, distance_to_ghost)  %>%
  rowwise() %>%
  mutate(combined_value = points_remaining * distance_to_ghost) %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  mutate(combined_value = rescale(combined_value))


value_results_only <- tibble(
  Estimate = numeric(0),
  `Std. Error` = numeric(0),
  df = numeric(0),
  `t value` = numeric(0),
  `Pr(>|t|)` = numeric(0)
)


for(step in sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time))){
  
  print(step)

  time_step_df <- ofc_hfa_lme_df %>%
    filter(move_time == step)
  
  model_1 <- summary(lmer(hfa ~ combined_value + (1|subject/elec_id), data = time_step_df))
  
    # add to results
  value_results_only <- rbind(value_results_only, 
                           tibble(
                             Estimate = model_1$coefficients[2, "Estimate"],
                             `Std. Error` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Std. Error"],
                             df = model_1$coefficients[2, "df"],
                             `t value` = model_1$coefficients[2, "t value"],
                             `Pr(>|t|)` = model_1$coefficients[2, "Pr(>|t|)"]
                           ))

}




```

```{r viz-models}

model_results_value <- value_results_only %>% mutate(move_time = sort(unique(ofc_hfa_lme_df$move_time)))
                       


plot <- model_results_value %>%
  mutate(sig = if_else(`Pr(>|t|)` < .05, "Sig", "Not Sig.")) %>%
  ggplot(., aes(x = move_time, y = Estimate)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = sig), size = 6, shape = 21, fill = "#D1B5F4") +
  geom_line(color = "#D1B5F4") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"), legend.position = "top") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("white", "black")) +
  xlim(0, 3.5) +ylim(-1, 1) +
  ggtitle("OFC HFA, Combined Value")


ggsave(path(here(), "figures", "linear_mixed_effect_models", "ofc_hfa_trial_combined_value.png"),
       plot = plot,
       width = 12,
       height = 8,
       units = "in",
       dpi = 300)

```
